title: Hidekichi Nagamatsu
text:
Hidekichi Nagamatsu (; August 4, 1914 – November 18, 1992) was a Japanese <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who competed in the <a href="1936%20Summer%20Olympics">1936 Summer Olympics</a>.
In 1936 he was eliminated in the second round of the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201936%20Summer%20Olympics%20-%20Men%27s%20lightweight">lightweight class</a> after losing his fight to the upcoming silver medalist <a href="Nikolai%20Stepulov">Nikolai Stepulov</a>.
